Posts.Content: Thank you, I think my mental function has decreased, but my oncologist disagrees. He's not living with my lack of navigation and math skills though. I really did have them once I swear! The worst part is...I am a realtor. Guess the jokes on me.
Posts.Title: Stage 4 breast cancer, need help

Posts.Content: Do not let go. I just remind myself that in those statistics...even at 100 to 1 somebody has to be one and I've got too much to do to join the 100.
Posts.Title: Stage 4 breast cancer, need help
